Title: Deliberate Orgasm: The Technique of Peaking and Extended Orgasm

reviewText: This DVD is unique in being sincere, candid, and considerate of sexuality. Explicit and unabashed - how sex is supposed to be. Title: Deliberate Orgasm: The Technique of Peaking and Extended Orgasm
